info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Color Trend 2017 is a collection of contemporary, neutral and classical colors that reflect the major social and design trends of today. The four palettes are divided into two sets because the palettes in a set have a clear relationship, albeit a divergent or even opposing one. Tradition with Technology and Maximal with Minimal. TRADITION, TECHNOLOGY, MAXIMAL, and MINIMAL
